description:
Situated on the Great Western Highway, east of Bathurst with outstanding highway location and triple access this property features a 250m (approx) frontage - ideal exposure for sales, service and display. Zoned RU1.

This breath-taking area just below the Blue Mountains National Park on seven accessible acres (approx) enjoys a well-designed home that amplifies the luxury of space for the growing family with the additional benefit of a One bedroom self contained granny flat an approved Artists Gallery. (Currently a successful business) “Raising Baby Moos” and before that a tea house, the possibilities are endless.

The property has a home, a self-contained granny flat, a usable workshop or barn, a double garage and another barn used for business.

Perfectly positioned, the private residence is set back from the other dwellings and boasts a commanding position overlooking tranquil rural vistas.

Accommodation includes three double bedrooms, a main with ensuite & walk-in robe, two bathrooms with spa, study nook, internal laundry and a country-style kitchen.

In addition, there is a one bedroom self contained granny flat a purpose-built double garage, plenty of room for storage and a separate, light-filled multi-purpose room, perfect for an office or art studio with its bathroom.

Situated amongst other superior acreage properties with multiple paddocks, this property is perfectly positioned close to Lithgow & Bathurst, schools, transport and medical necessities.

At a glance
- Purpose-built live/work lifestyle
- Artists Gallery that is DA approved
- Additional self-contained granny flat
- 15 car spaces, a secure double garage, and another workshop/shed
- 3 street access points and frontage to the Great Western Highway
- Architecturally solid in design, a single-level, generously sized clad home
- Main bedroom with ensuite & walk-in robe
- The main bathroom includes a spa
- Reverse cycle air conditioning
- Wood burner
- Solar panels
- Features such as a study nook, floorboards, internal laundry and character country kitchen amplify the scenic outlook
- Multiple living areas
- Expansive wrap-around verandah for relaxing, entertaining and enjoying the views beyond
- Easy care country cottage garden
- Several paddocks and shelters
- Usable water tanks and a fully fenced property

From all of us at HR Realtors & Lifestyle Property Specialists, we wish you every success in your search for your new property. If you would like more details on this land or to chat about one of the many other properties available, please call or email us today at (02) 6355 2002; we'd love to talk more.

Disclaimer: HR Realtors & Lifestyle Property Specialists believe that all information contained herein be true & correct to the best of our ability & in no way misleading; however, all interested parties are advised to carry out their own enquiries and relevant searches.

The price of this property is listed in Australian Dollars (AUD) at the beginning of this description, and that should be used as a price guide for this property.

Please call (02) 6355 2002 to arrange a private inspection.

listers.name: Kristie Trouchet-Nilsson
listers.job_title: Principal L.R.E.A, Stock & Station Agent & C.I.P.S
